Hence , hypothesize different pneumoperitoneal pressure may lead different level TnT prolong robot-assisted surgery . This clinical trial conduct Huadong Hospital Affiliated Fudan University Ruijin Hospital Shanghai Jiao Tong University School Medicine , tertiary hospital Shanghai , China . After sign Informed Consent , subject meet eligibility criterion randomly assign low- standard-pressure pneumoperitoneum group.The randomization plan implement use statistical software R , store online database.These subject recruit January 1st 2016 December 31st 2017 . TnT set primary endpoint trial evaluate myocardial injury , measure patient undergo in-patient robot-assisted urological surgery within 24 hour postoperatively use fourth-generation high-sensitivity TnT assay . The total sample size 280.With 140 patient two treatment group , power least 0.70 detect increment TnT level among 80 % subjects.Chest CT scan use diagnose pulmonary complication third day postoperatively .
